text: @JoeBiden Joe Biden said 120 millions Americans die of Coronavirus: Senile Dementia! What are democratic politicians doing during Coronavirus outbreak?  Only thing you do is hiding in home and president and all people who are fighting at frontline and cheating naive young people.
